title: Rangola Lyrics Ghajini
stanzas:
<div>
<div>
Rangola Lyrics Ghajini

Rangola hola hola
penne neethaano
unnai muththamittu
otti konda vannam
naanthaano

ho Rangola hola hola
rasaa neethaano
unnai muththamittu
otti konda vannam
naanthaano

komala valli valli
kangalaal kollum villi.
thiumbi naan nikkasolli
vachividavaa malli.

kaathavarayaa raayaa
malli poo venaam poyaa
malaiya vaangi thaayaa
enna nee tholumel
thookki poyaa

Rangola hola hola
penne neethaano
unnai muththamittu
otti konda vannam
naanthaano

ho Rangola hola hola
rasaa neethaano
unnai muththamittu
otti konda vannam
naanthaano

oh.. nila nila
paradhu vaayen
ulaginai marandhu vaayen.
azhaginai nerungi vaayen
alai alaiyaai.

thodaamale anaikkuraane
thadaalenu izhukkuraane
vidaamale thorathuraane
adaavadiyaa

naan oruthalara unakulla
una manandhida
udaikkavaa villa.

kurunkadal pola
kodhikkuthu aasa
kulikkalam vaa mella.

ye iduppula kuzhunguthu
saavi adha vedukkunu
edukkura paavi

kaigala thottu
kasamusaa senjaa
kaththuven kaikoovi.

ho Rangola hola hola
rasaa neethaano
unnai muththamittu
otti konda vannam
naanthaano

ilamaiyai varuduraane
idhayathai thiruduraane
uyirinai neruduraane
sugam sugamaai

oh thalirena irukkuraale
palir ena sirikkuraale
sulir muraikkuraale
azhagazhagaa

un manakatti vandi meedhu
naan menakettu
yaerum podhu

thada thada vendru
thada thada vendru
izhuthavan neethaane.

naan sadugu aadum podhu
nee thodugira ellai kodu
vidu vidu endru
pada pada vendru
parandhaval neethaane.

Rangola hola hola
penne neethaano
unnai muththamittu
otti konda vannam
naanthaano

ho Rangola hola hola
rasaa neethaano
unnai muththamittu
otti konda vannam
naanthaano

komala valli valli
kangalaal kollum villi.
thiumbi naan nikkasolli
vachividavaa malli.

kaathavarayaa raayaa
malli poo venaam poyaa
malaiya vaangi thaayaa
enna nee tholumel
thookki poyaa
